text: Skins (spelled in all caps) is the third studio album by American rapper, XXXTentacion. Skins was released posthumously on December 7, 2018. It was the first studio album that was released after his murder. On December 23, 2017, while on house arrest, X announced the album along with Bad Vibes Forever and ?. On Skins, X explores many different genres from emo rap and nu metal to screamo and trap. He raps and sings about topics like heartbreak and depression. He has features from notable artists like drummer Travis Barker from Blink-182 and rapper Kanye West. The album debuted at #1 on the Billboard 200 and selling 132,000 album-equivalent units. The album became X's second album to reach #1. Skins has become Gold since it's release. The album featured the single "Bad!". ==Songs== ==References== Category:2018 albums Category:XXXTentacion albums Category:Empire Distribution albums
title: Skins (album)
